MersenneTwisterFast - Class in com.dkriesel.snipe.util
MersenneTwister and MersenneTwisterFast Version 16, based on version MT199937(99/10/29) of the Mersenne Twister algorithm found at The Mersenne Twister Home Page, with the initialization improved using the new 2002/1/26 initialization algorithm By Sean Luke, October 2004.

Constructor using an array of integers as seed.
MultilayerPerceptron838ProblemBackprop - Class in com.dkriesel.snipe.examples
Very simple example program that trains an 8-3-8 multilayer perceptron encoder problem with backpropagation of error.

mutateTopologySplitNeuron(int) - Method in class com.dkriesel.snipe.core.NeuralNetwork
Splits an inner Neuron according to the cell division process in [Odri93].
mutateTopologySplitSynapseAndAddNeuron(int, int) - Method in class com.dkriesel.snipe.core.NeuralNetwork
Splits a synapse from neuron i to neuron k by removing it and inserting another neuron j and two synapses from i to j and from j to k.
mutateWeightsGAStyle() - Method in class com.dkriesel.snipe.core.NeuralNetwork
